As part of Mickletown FAS, we’ve worked with @BAMNuttall to make carbon savings during construction. 

By using clay and fill materials already on-site, we have removed 300 vehicle journeys! This has reduced:
-carbon emissions
-waste materials going to landfill
-noise

tweets.text:
Africa cannot continue to be the damping sites for chemicals and pesticides banned elsewhere killing our  pollinators in the name of food security. 

This one just a visit to one farm in Kimana kenya.

We will continue sampling chemicals used in farms through out October. https://t.co/FbT27hCPiz

#Fish of the Severn Estuary are under threat. Thousands of fish will die in the double-decker sized cooling tunnels at Hinkley Point C. @EnvAgency @CefasGovUK @The_MMO please make the right decision and make sure an AFD is installed, as the DCO states. #SaveSevernsFish
@bettwsresident @DaveThroupEA As I've said before, every year it's not happening in the SW. After last winter I thought it would. The PINPOINT training course last year was a case in point

Yes! Our #chalkstream needs this. Scope for a host of groups to come together to think about how to make Benson Brook /Ewelme Stream better. @EwelmePC @BensonParish @BensonCofE @WildOxfordshire @ChilternsAONB @ChilternSociety @bensonbirdman @EnvAgency @TVERC1 @NE_Thames https://t.co/hbJYVmX3y1

@craftednouns @EnvAgency You mean in dividends?

De-silting works underway in #Hillsborough #Sheffield.

tweets.text:
Fancy doing something about this any month soon? @CanalRiverTrust? Simultaneously insufficient suction to actually get a pumpout, but happily accepts credits (read 'money') to pump sewage out onto the towpath. London. Hackney. "Here East". (I'll e-mail for refund.)

@EnvAgency https://t.co/TLH6m6XYxn

A new flood alleviation scheme in Mickletown, which will reduce flood risk to properties, is currently being constructed. Great work @LeedsCC_News @EnvAgencyYNE @BAMNuttall 👏 #flooding https://t.co/dsVgAqio9D

Now that site investigations have taken place at the Milford Place footbridge, we will soon be installing temporary works to raise the bridge so it can better manage higher river levels during a flood event.  In advance of this, we have installed scaffolding shown in these pics https://t.co/mZzI7ESFi0
@HeritageFundUK @DefraGovUK @NaturalEngland @EnvAgency @DCMS This is great! 💚 Do you know if there's a similar #GreenRecovery funding pot for Wales? Diolch/ thanks.
